thread.title: Tata Consultancy Services Profit Rose 14.5% Last Quarter
thread.title_full: Tata Consultancy Services Profit Rose 14.5% Last Quarter

author: morningstar.com
title: Tata Consultancy Services Profit Rose 14.5% Last Quarter
text:
By Newley Purnell
BANGALORE, India--Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. on Tuesday reported a 14.5% rise in its fiscal second-quarter net profit driven by strong demand in North America and the U.K.
India's biggest outsourcer by revenue said profit in the three months ended Sept. 30 stood at 60.55 billion rupees ($929 million), compared with 52.88 billion rupees a year earlier.
That was marginally higher than the 60.08 billion rupees consensus forecast of analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters. Revenue grew 14% to 271.65 billion rupees.
"Great execution" has led to "strong sequential growth" in sectors such as banking and financial services in international markets, Chief Executive Officer N. Chandrasekaran said in a statement.
Write to Newley Purnell at newley.purnell@wsj.com
 13, 2015 08:50 ET (12:50
